title: Back to Bed RePack by MAXAGENT
description:
=================================
Year: August 7, 2014 
Genre: Arcade (Platform) / 3D 
Developer: Bedtime Gaming and Rusty Dice Digital Games 
Publisher: Bedtime Gaming and Rusty Dice Digital Games 
Publication Type: RePack 
Language text: English 
Language voice: English 
Tablet: enclosing "RELOADED" 
Game Version: x86-641.0.0a 

=================================
Operating system: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8 
Processor: Intel Pentium D945 (Dual Core 3400 MHz) / AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ (Dual Core 3000 MHz) 
RAM: 2 GB 
Hard disk space: 1 GB 
Sound device: compatible with DirectX 
Video Card: Nvidia GeForce GT 610 (1024MB) / ATI Radeon 4770 (512MB) 

=================================
Back to bed is a 3D puzzle game taking place in surreal environments, containing optical illusions as well as helpful and dangerous objects. The player is not the one trying to get to the end of the puzzle, but is instead trying to help a sleepwalker to the safety of his bed. The challenge is to use and manipulate the different objects, to steer the sleepwalker to safety.
